text: was a Japanese runner who won the 1500 m event at the 1927 and 1930 Far Eastern Championship Games. He competed at the 1928 and 1932 Olympics in the marathon and finished in fifth and sixth place, respectively. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Japanese male long-distance runners Category:Olympic athletes of Japan Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:Japanese male marathon runners Category:Kansai University alumni
title: Seiichiro Tsuda
